index.title: Support GLAMs (Galleries, Libraries, Archives, Museums) in monitoring and evaluating their cooperation with Wikimedia projects

categoryNetwork.title: CATEGORY NETWORK
categoryNetwork.description: Category network is a GRAPH CHART that shows the subcategories' topology belonging to the main category. Each node represents a category, while the edges are the relations.

userContribution.title: USER CONTRIBUTION
userContribution.description: Users contribution is a BAR CHART that shows the number of uploads during time. Here you can study if the contribution pattern is well distributed or if it's composed by spikes.

usage.title: USAGE
usage.description: This chart shows the usage of the media of the main category in Wikimedia projects.

views.title: VIEWS
views.description: Views is a LINE CHART that shows the sum of the views for the files thats belong to the main category with a 24h span.

suggestions.title: SUGGESTIONS
suggestions.description: This page shows some unused files with links to wikidata and wikipedia pages where they can be used.
